title: Amazon Luna drops early access in the US w/ new $9.99 price, Jackbox games, free Prime games
content:
Amazon has long been testing out its cloud gaming service Luna in the United States, but only under an early access badge with invites needed to join in on the fun. Today, Amazon Luna is launching fully in the US, with a new higher price tag, more games on the service, and a new Prime gaming channel that offers free games every month.

moreâ€¦

The post Amazon Luna drops early access in the US w/ new $9.99 price, Jackbox games, free Prime games appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Amazon Luna has officially graduated from early access with new games, features, and a new price model that's open to anyone in the US.
